title: Why, volume?? Whyyy???
body: I just have a question, why does the volume reset to 100 every single time the game gets updated??? Every update, I turn on the game and it BLOWS my ears completely off. I was just curious.

replies.body: Sounds like your settings are getting completely reset after each patch, which is honestly pretty weird since those settings are saved server-side for the most part.
Hey i dont know why it doing it but Right too the ? you click it and go too sounds put it down never have the issue again :)
